actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from ACIR, GSA, OMB.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to prohibit the sale of real property in one State to any agency or instrumentality of another State.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to prohibit the Administrator of General Services from conveying surplus real property located in one State to an agency or instrumentality of another State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to prohibit the sale of real property in one State to any agency or instrumentality of another State.
